data.expected: The lightness value of the hex code #a5582d is 41%.
data.sampled:
The lightness value of the hex code #a5582d is 33.33%, which rounds up to 34% for convenience when converting to decimal form. In other words:

34 / 255 = 1.68 → Rounding down to 1, we get 34/255=1.68 or 1.67… → 1.67 * 100 = 167 → Finally, multiply by 255 to convert from 0-255 back into percent format: 167 * 255 / 100 ≈ 32 → The lightness value of the hex code #a5582d is approximately 32%.

data.expected: The lightness value of the hex code #80ccc5 is 65%.
data.sampled:
I am not sure what you mean by "lightness" but I believe you want me to convert this hex colour into an RGB or CMYK equivalent. The hex code #80ccc5 represents a shade of green. To convert this to RGB:

R = 0.6745; G=0.9098; B=1.0  (approximate)

So in RGB terms the hex code #80ccc5 would be R:0,G:0,B:50%   or C:49%,M:99%,Y:100%
In CMYK terms:
C = 55; M = 80; Y = 5; K = 0  (approximate)

So in CMYK the hex code #80ccc5 would be C:55,M:80,Y:5,K:0%   or m:79%,y:85%,k:0%
